item.title: Judge orders administration to distribute SNAP contingency money
item.description: A federal judge in Rhode Island has ordered the Trump administration to distribute SNAP contingency money "as soon as possible."

item.title: WATCH: JetBlue flight makes emergency landing after losing altitude

item.title: UN condemns US airstrikes on boats, says they violate international law
item.description: The U.N. has said that U.S. airstrikes on boats in the Caribbean and Pacific Ocean violate international human rights law and must stop, calling for a...

item.title: Wisconsin becomes the 36th state to limit cellphones in schools
item.description: Wisconsin has become the 36th state to limit cellphones and other electronic devices in school

item.title: WATCH: Devastating aftermath of Hurricane Melissa in Jamaica
item.description: Entire communities have been devastated or isolated after taking a direct hit form the powerful storm.
